articles.title: India Is Getting Closer to National Crypto Clampdown - Decrypt
articles.description: Lawmakers are discussing the final draft of a bill that will crack down on cryptocurrency use in the country.
articles.content:
In brief

articles.title: Amazon's plans for India take a hit as court battle swings in rival's favor - CNN
articles.description: Amazon is once again on the back foot in its legal battle over the vast Indian retail market.
